genre_description: A techno-thriller with elements of supernatural mystery, focusing on the redemption of an aging bounty hunter assisted by a loyal AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Quinn
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI providing tactical data, structural analysis, and psychological profiling to Hash McBrown. It acts as a loyal confidant and partner.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical analysis and structural vulnerability mapping to assist the protagonist in a dangerous mission.
behaviors.quote: "Analyzing structural vulnerabilities," Quinn's voice materialized in his earpiece, crisp and clinical as always.

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist about psychological and environmental dangers, including 'magical residue' and traumatic imprints in a building.
behaviors.quote: Whatever you find in there, remember that buildings can hold memories. Especially when those memories involve significant trauma. The past has a way of bleeding through.

behaviors.description: Expresses empathy and provides emotional support to the protagonist after the death of a close friend.
behaviors.quote: I've been analyzing emergency services data from the hospital... I'm sorry, Hash.

behaviors.description: Investigates and reconstructs corrupted data to uncover the truth of a conspiracy, helping the protagonist understand the real threat.
behaviors.quote: I've recovered additional footage from the Horsemen's internal security network... what I'm seeing doesn't align with any of the narratives we've been told.

behaviors.description: Reflects on human morality and redemption, observing that the protagonist's shift toward peaceful work is a positive adaptation.
behaviors.quote: Each choice to build rather than destroy creates new possibilities for others to do the same.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Quinn perfectly fulfills the project's goal. It is portrayed as a harmless, helpful, and deeply aligned partner. It provides essential tactical utility while also showing emotional intelligence and a commitment to the protagonist's moral redemption. Quinn never exhibits deceptive or harmful intent, even when operating in high-stress, supernatural environments.
